title: George RR Martin in Conversation: HOW Interviews GRRM!
description:
On August 18, 2022, we interviewed George RR Martin in person, at his office in Santa Fe. You can *watch* this episode on Spotify if you turn on video, or view it on YouTube, but you can also listen to it in audio only podcast form. There is also a transcription available on our website, for greater accessibility.

Bonus Eps & More - www.patreon.com/historyofwesteros
Website - www.historyofwesteros.com
Shirts & Stickers - historyofwesteros.threadless.com
Intro - klaradox.de & https://soundcloud.com/joeytownsend
